705638f-a.title: Brooklyn: McDonald Avenue - Avenue N
705638f-a.text:
1575 Mc Donald Ave., east side, north of Ave. N., showing a home on
the estate of J.R. Lake in 1873. I 1890 it belonged to Thomas Ferguson.
It was demolished prior to 1929.
April 1923.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
MAY BE REPRODUCED.
705638f-a.folder: McDonald Avenue & Avenue N, Brooklyn, NY
